verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

After the <S%H4639>doings<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> you <S%H3427>dwelled,<s%> shall you not <S%H6213>do:<s%> and after the <S%H4639>doings<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I <S%H935>bring<s%> you, shall you not <S%H6213>do:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you <S%H3212>walk<s%> in their <S%H2708>ordinances.<s%>
You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H2708>ordinances,<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> therein: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

You shall therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and my <S%H4941>judgments:<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> if a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>do,<s%> he shall <S%H2425>live<s%> in them: I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H376>None<s%> <S%H3808><s%> of you shall <S%H7126>approach<s%> to <S%H376>any<s%> that is <S%H7607>near<s%> of <S%H1320>kin<s%> to him, to <S%H1540>uncover<s%> their <S%H6172>nakedness:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

The <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H1>father,<s%> or the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H517>mother,<s%> shall you not <S%H1540>uncover:<s%> she is your <S%H517>mother;<s%> you shall not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>
The <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> shall you not <S%H1540>uncover:<s%> it is your <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>

The <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H269>sister,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of your <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of your <S%H517>mother,<s%> whether she be <S%H4138>born<s%> at <S%H1004>home,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4138>born<s%> <S%H2351>abroad,<s%> even their <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> you shall not <S%H1540>uncover.<s%>

The <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> of your <S%H1323>daughter's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> even their <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> you shall not <S%H1540>uncover:<s%> for <S%H2007>theirs<s%> is your own <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>

The <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H802>wife's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H4138>begotten<s%> of your <S%H1>father,<s%> she is your <S%H269>sister,<s%> you shall not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>
You shall not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H269>sister:<s%> she is your <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H7607>near<s%> <S%H7607>kinswoman.<s%>
You shall not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H269>sister:<s%> for she is your <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H7607>near<s%> <S%H7607>kinswoman.<s%>

You shall not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H251>brother,<s%> you shall not <S%H7126>approach<s%> to his <S%H802>wife:<s%> she is your <S%H1733>aunt.<s%>

You shall not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H3618>daughter<s%> in <S%H3618>law:<s%> she is your <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H802>wife;<s%> you shall not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>
You shall not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H802>wife:<s%> it is your <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>

You shall not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you <S%H3947>take<s%> her <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> or her <S%H1323>daughter's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> to <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> for they are her <S%H7608>near<s%> <S%H7608>kinswomen:<s%> it is <S%H2154>wickedness.<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall you <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> to her <S%H269>sister,<s%> to <S%H6887>vex<s%> her, to <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness,<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> the other in her <S%H2416>life<s%> time.

Also you shall not <S%H7126>approach<s%> to a <S%H802>woman<s%> to <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness,<s%> as long as she is <S%H5079>put<s%> <S%H5079>apart<s%> for her <S%H2932>uncleanness.<s%>
Moreover you shall not <S%H5414>lie<s%> <S%H7903><s%> <S%H7903>carnally<s%> <S%H2233><s%> with your <S%H5997>neighbor's<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> to <S%H2930>defile<s%> yourself with her.

And you shall not let any of your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the fire to <S%H4432>Molech,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you <S%H2490>profane<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of your <S%H430>God:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
You shall not <S%H7901>lie<s%> with <S%H2145>mankind,<s%> as with <S%H802>womankind:<s%> it is <S%H8441>abomination.<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall you <S%H5414>lie<s%> <S%H7903><s%> with <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H929>beast<s%> to <S%H2930>defile<s%> yourself therewith: <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall any <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> a <S%H929>beast<s%> to <S%H7250>lie<s%> <S%H7250>down<s%> thereto: it is <S%H8397>confusion.<s%>

<S%H2930>Defile<s%> not you yourselves in <S%H3605>any<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> things: for in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H2930>defiled<s%> which I <S%H7971>cast<s%> out <S%H6440>before<s%> you:

And the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H2930>defiled:<s%> therefore I do <S%H6485>visit<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> thereof on it, and the <S%H776>land<s%> itself <S%H6958>vomits<s%> out her <S%H3427>inhabitants.<s%>

You shall therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and shall not <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8441>abominations;<s%> neither any of your <S%H249>own<s%> <S%H249>nation,<s%> nor any <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojournes<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you:

(For <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H411>these<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> have the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6213>done,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H2930>defiled;<s%>)
That the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6958>spew<s%> not you out also, when you <S%H2930>defile<s%> it, as it <S%H6958>spewed<s%> out the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that were <S%H6440>before<s%> you.

For <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> shall <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> even the <S%H5315>souls<s%> that <S%H6213>commit<s%> them shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from <S%H7130>among<s%> their <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Therefore shall you <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4931>ordinance,<s%> that you <S%H6213>commit<s%> not any one of these <S%H8441>abominable<s%> <S%H2708>customs,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and that you <S%H2930>defile<s%> not yourselves therein: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
